text: Path to Succession: Call to Arms
Path to Succession: Maker of Kings
The chieftains and warriors still mourn Tanshihuai and the confederation he built. Until the specters of the past are lifted, there is no hopeful future.
The disparate peoples of the Xianbei must be reunited and brought back into one fold, however without a great leader to unite them, any alliance would be only temporary...
The great and famous chieftains and headsmen must step forth, and forge their people a path out of the darkness.
The shackles of the past must be lifted once and for all. The young, the keen, the brave and the wise stake their claims, and let their ambitions be known.
A new nation of the Xianbei has been forged by blood, and a nascent legacy of a chief among chiefs is waiting to ascend previously unheard of heights.
[[b]]Path to Succession[[/b]] can be increased by winning battles, and having casualities on both sides.
[[b]]Path to Succession[[/b]] can be decreased by losing battles and decay
For the Xianbei to truly thrive, the strong must strive. \\n\\n The old paths of succession must be maintained, lest the clans crumble and disperse.
• Path increases attributes of units and generals, boosting morale and replenishment
• Path reduces the happiness of generals
• Path is gained through winning battles and casualities on both sides
• Path is loss through lossing battles and decay
• Legacy is used to recruit, release, unassign and banish characters
• Legacy is gained through faction leader, faction heir positions, and family
For the Xianbei to truly thrive, the strong must strive.
For the Xianbei to truly thrive, the strong must strive.
